content_block_static.name: Training/ Tuiting Reimbursement Form
content_block_static.static_content:
The growth and development of our employees at Plus3 is something that we thrive on. We want to make
sure that each employee is using their full $5000/ year training budget to continue their development at
Plus3 IT. Below is a step by step instruction guide on what is needed to complete this form.
 
Please note all expenses MUST be entered within 30 days of the training for reimbursement. Also,
individual training time outside of prep courses is NOT chargeable and must be done on the employee's
own time.
 
If you have any other questions, please let me know. We want you to take full advantage of this program
and its benefits.

 

Create New Form
